name: gcloud
author: Google Inc.
description: Google Cloud APIs Client Library for Node.js

scripts.docs: dox < lib/index.js > docs/json/master/index.json & dox < lib/datastore/dataset.js > docs/json/master/datastore/dataset.json & dox < lib/datastore/index.js > docs/json/master/datastore/index.json & dox < lib/datastore/query.js > docs/json/master/datastore/query.json & dox < lib/storage/index.js > docs/json/master/storage/index.json
scripts.cover: istanbul cover -x 'regression/* lib/pubsub/*' _mocha -- --timeout 15000 test/* regression/datastore.js regression/storage.js
scripts.coveralls: istanbul cover -x 'regression/* lib/pubsub/*' _mocha --report lcovonly -- --timeout 15000 test/* regression/datastore.js regression/storage.js -R spec && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js && rm -rf ./coverage
